text: No Retreat, No Surrender is a 1985 American Chinese action movie directed by Corey Yuen and starring Kurt McKinney, Jean-Claude Van Damme, Tai-chung Kim, Peter "Sugarfoot" Cunningham. It was distributed by New World Pictures. It was followed up by two sequels. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1985 action movies Category:American action movies Category:Chinese movies Category:Movies about friendship Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in Nevada Category:Movies set in Seattle Category:Martial arts movies
title: No Retreat, No Surrender
